/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, filled with a multitude of cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the overcast sky. Traffic lights and street signs punctuate the scene at regular intervals, guiding the flow of vehicles. The colors in the image are muted, with shades of gray and brown dominating the palette, reflecting the overcast weather conditions. Despite the lack of vibrant hues, the image conveys a sense of the everyday hustle and bustle of city life in Beijing.
